Description.desc: Only the following vaccines are accepted (EMA or WHO): AstraZeneca, Biontech, Janssen, Moderna, CoronaVac, Inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-Vero-Cell, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, Covaxin, Nuvaxovid, Covovax, WIBP-CorV.
Nur die folgenden Impfstoffe werden akzeptiert: AstraZeneca, Biontech, Janssen, Moderna, CoronaVac, Inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-Vero-Cell, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, Covaxin, Nuvaxovid, Covovax, WIBP-CorV.
Seuls les vaccins suivants sont accept√©s : AstraZeneca, Biontech, Janssen, Moderna, CoronaVac, Inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-Vero-Cell, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, Covaxin, Nuvaxovid, Covovax, WIBP-CorV.

Solo se aceptan las siguientes vacunas (EMA o OMS): AstraZeneca, Biontech, Janssen, Moderna, CoronaVac, Inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-Vero-Cell, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, Covaxin, Nuvaxovid, Covovax, WIBP-CorV.
Saranno accettati solamente i seguenti vaccini: AstraZeneca, Biontech, Janssen, Moderna, CoronaVac, Inactivated-SARS-CoV-2-Vero-Cell, Covishield, BBIBP-CorV, Covaxin, Nuvaxovid, Covovax, WIBP-CorV.
